skills.title: Front-end
skills.description: A skilled software engineer proficient in front-end technologies. Experienced in building responsive and user-friendly web applications. Passionate about solving complex problems and delivering high-quality code.

skills.title: Back-end
skills.description: A proficient back-end developer with expertise in designing and implementing server-side logic and databases. Experienced in building scalable and efficient APIs. Dedicated to ensuring the performance and security of web applications.

skills.title: Full-stack
skills.description: A versatile full-stack developer proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies. Capable of designing and implementing end-to-end solutions. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver successful projects.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: An experienced DevOps engineer proficient in automating deployment pipelines and managing infrastructure as code. Skilled in implementing CI/CD practices and ensuring the reliability and scalability of cloud-based applications.

portfolio.title: Hao App
portfolio.description: Hao is a simple web app that solves this problem by allowing landlords' and landladies to gather, manipulate and store data for sound decision making and planning.

testimonial.description: Working with Richard has been a game-changer. His expertise, professionalism, and dedication have consistently delivered exceptional results, exceeding our expectations. Richard's innovative solutions and reliable communication make him an invaluable asset to any project.

Partnering with this talented professional has been a transformative experience. Her dedication, expertise, and proactive approach have significantly enhanced our projects. Her ability to understand and meet our needs makes her an invaluable asset. I highly recommend her for any endeavor.

I am incredibly impressed by the expertise and dedication of the individual I had the pleasure of collaborating with. Her innovative solutions and attention to detail have consistently exceeded our expectations. She brings a unique perspective and valuable insights to every project.
